actions: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
*Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:* +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. *Hit:* 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
description: A monodrone can perform one simple task at a time and can relay a single message of up to forty-eight words.
name: Monodrone
traits: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.
If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.
